title: The Man who had no dream
creator_credit: Sam Weiss, Nick Bosustow and Churchill Films
brief_description: Animated story based on the book by Adelaide Holl about an idle man who discovers meaning in his life through activity and caring for others. Narrated by Jacques Aubuchon. Suitable for upper primary and lower secondary levels.
